SEARCH
Package Model

Class Room

java.lang.Object
Model.Room
public class Room extends Object
The Room class represents a hotel room, including its name, price per night, availability, and reservations. It provides methods to manage reservations and check availability.

      roomType - the type of the room (e.g., Deluxe, Executive, Standard)

      Parameters:
      checkIn - the check-in date
      checkOut - the check-out date
      Returns:
      true if the room is available, otherwise false
